All Classes

  • Class Description
    Action
    This class defines actions that a player can do during a game.
    Action.Builder  
    Action.Type
    Each type of this enum represents a specific action that a player can do in the game
    ActionDeniedException
    This exception is launched when a player tries to do an action he cannot do
    AdrenalinePacket  
    AdrenalinePacket.Type  
    AdrenalineSocket  
    AdrenalineSocketListener  
    AmmoCard
    This class contains all the information about an ammo card.
    AmmoCard.Color
    The Color.
    AmmoCard.Type
    The Type.
    API
    Interface for all communication methods.
    Bounds
    Each cell has 4 bounds, each bound can be a door, a wall or nothing, that means that the two cells are in the same room.
    Bounds.Direction
    Direction enum.
    Bounds.Type
    Type of the bound.
    CardNotFoundException  
    Cell
    Cell class, each cell is the atom of the board, some cells are spawnpoint, the others are just normal cells which have an ammo card on it, more cells compose a room and more rooms compose the game board.
    Cell.Color
    Color enum.
    Cell.Creator
    The class that allow to create a game cell
    Deck<T extends java.io.Serializable>
    This class is composed of three decks that contains the playable, exited (on the game board or in players' hand) and discarded (already used and needed to be reshuffled) cards.
    Deck.Creator
    Creator.
    Displayable
    Implemented when an object is a displayable card.
    EmptyDeckException  
    Game
    This class contains the information that a player needs to know the state of the game
    Game.Type
    Defines the different maps that players can choose as battlefield
    GameImpl  
    GameImpl.Creator
    Creator construct the game starting from parameters of the room
    Listener  
    Message
    In game message wrapper class.
    Opt<T>
    Optionals in Java sucks.
    Player
    In this class all the information about the state of a player, like name, position, items owned etc...
    Player.BoardType  
    PlayerNotFoundException  
    PowerUp
    Each PowerUp card is composed in 2 parts: it has a specific type and a color.
    PowerUp.Type  
    Room
    The place where users wait to begin a new Game.
    SelfResponseException  
    User  
    User.Auth  
    UserRemoteException  
    Utils  
    Weapon
